name: thanks mom
description:
"thanks mom" is an adventure game where you control a baby.

◆ Story

You are a baby.
You are given milk by your mother and sleeping soundly.
In your dream, you remember the trials and tribulations that happened in the past.
It may have been the days of struggle before you were born.
Please do your best to make sure it doesn't turn into a nightmare.

◆ Game Features

An adventure game where you progress by examining objects.
There is no time limit, so you can play at your own pace.
You can enjoy it casually in a short amount of time.
You can hear the lively voice of a baby.

Playtime: 10 to 20 minutes

◆ Video Streaming Guidelines

Streaming is possible without permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.

"When you find the cow, the ending changes."
